Get KenPom's player stats from the team page

Source: R/kp_team_tables.R
kp_team_players.Rd

Get KenPom's player stats from the team page

kp_team_players(team, year = 2021)

Arguments

team

Team filter to select.
year

Year of data to pull

Examples

  # \donttest{
    try(kp_team_players(team = 'Florida St.', year = 2021))

#> # A tibble: 13 × 54
